text: Telephone voting, shortened to televoting, is when people vote to make a decision by telephone, such as texting or calling a certain number to vote for what they want. It is often used for reality TV competitions (such as Big Brother, The Voice, The X Factor and I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here) to decide which contestants are leaving or winning. It is also used in the Eurovision Song Contest for viewers to vote for their favourite country. Category:Voting systems
title: Televoting
